channel.title: [Help] running a server issue! [Help]
channel.description:
So basicly I know this is dumb but I dont have java installed and java wont work when I try to install it meaning I cannot run a server so I was wondering if their might happen to be a way to get the java libary files in a zip format to extract to my local disc as I think the java installer is the problem.
Any help would be apreciated +rep
